template.name: pluginheaders
template.value:
/* * Plugin Name: $NAME$ * Plugin URI: $URL$ * Description: $DESC$ * Version: 1.0 * Author: Micah Wood * Author URI: https://wpscholar.com * License: GPL2 * License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html * Text Domain: $TEXTDOMAIN$ * Domain Path: /languages */
$END$

template.name: posttypelabels
template.value: 'labels' => array( 'name' => _x( '$PLURAL$', 'post type general name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'singular_name' => _x( '$SINGULAR$', 'post type singular name', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'add_new' => _x( 'Add New', '$LC_SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'add_new_item' => __( 'Add New $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'edit_item' => __( 'Edit $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'new_item' => __( 'New $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'view_item' => __( 'View $SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'view_items' => __( 'View $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'search_items' => __( 'Search $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'not_found' => __( 'No $LC_PLURAL$ found.', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'not_found_in_trash' => __( 'No $LC_PLURAL$ found in Trash.', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'parent_item_colon' => __( 'Parent $SINGULAR$:', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Hierarchical only 'all_items' => __( 'All $PLURAL$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'archives' => __( '$SINGULAR$ Archives', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'attributes' => __( '$SINGULAR$ Attributes', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Post type must support 'page-attributes' 'insert_into_item' => __( 'Insert into $LC_SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'upload_to_this_item' => __( 'Uploaded to this $LC_SINGULAR$', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'featured_image' => __( 'Featured Image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'set_featured_image' => __( 'Set featured image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'remove_featured_image' => __( 'Remove featured image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'use_featured_image' => __( 'Use featured image', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'menu_name' => _x( '$PLURAL$', 'admin menu', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), // Default is value of 'name' 'filter_items_list' => __( 'Filter $LC_PLURAL$ list', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'items_list_navigation' => __( '$PLURAL$ list navigation', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'items_list' => __( '$PLURAL$ list', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), 'name_admin_bar' => _x( '$SINGULAR$', 'add new on admin bar', '$TEXTDOMAIN$' ), ),
